JobFullDesc:
Video Analytics is seeking a Senior Analyst to support Condé Nast Entertainment (CNE), an award-winning next generation studio and distribution network with entertainment content across film, television, premium digital video, social, virtual reality and OTT channels. CNE develops, produces and distributes video content across 17 brands, including Bon Appétit, Glamour, GQ, Vanity Fair, Vogue and Wired.

In this role, you will be responsible for the data foundation on which CNE and Condé Nast as a whole rely to understand video performance. That includes ownership of CNE’s single-source-of-truth reporting on video performance data, but also maintenance of key video metadata that helps stakeholders group that data in ways that are critical to analysis, insights, strategy, and decision-making. In addition to the hard skills that you will need to bring to bear, you will also need to demonstrate a number of important soft skills: collegiality, reliability, attention to detail, and most importantly a passion for data and how it enables the business to succeed.

Responsibilities


Own reporting: gather and collate data across more than a dozen brands, platforms, and markets
Perform analysis: use basic stats to benchmark video performance across segments and time periods; develop back-of-the-envelope analysis techniques for sometimes imperfect data
Maintain metadata: identify and resolve gaps and discrepancies; help implement more robust tagging processes for video assets
Manage partner data: work with video distribution stakeholders to onboard new data sources; resolve mapping errors; track availability of metrics across partners
Other duties as assigned: monitor tests; support dashboards; build decks; etc.

Requirements


At least 2 years of work experience as a researcher and/or analyst (Media & Entertainment experience preferred)
High proficiency in spreadsheets (Excel, Google Sheets), especially in how to automate data wrangling and analysis
At least some proficiency in SQL preferred
Strong analytical and data interpretation skills
Reliability, with an eye for detail and an obsession with accuracy
Self-driven and growth-oriented mindset
